home.title: NATIONAL EX SERVICEMEN PARTY
home.subtitle: A party for ex-servicemen and common people of India.
home.about_party_text: The National Ex-Servicemen Coordination Committee, an organization dedicated to the welfare of ex-servicemen, has now transformed into the National Ex-Servicemen Party. We are a registered political party under the Election Commission of India. Our aim is to fight for the rights of ex-servicemen and work towards the betterment of our country. Join us in our mission to bring about a positive change.
home.vision_text: Our vision is to create a society where ex-servicemen are respected and their needs are met. We want to ensure that they have access to good healthcare, education, and employment opportunities. We also want to work towards creating a secure and prosperous India for all.
home.mission_text: Our mission is to be the voice of ex-servicemen in the political arena. We want to contest elections and form a government that is sensitive to the needs of ex-servicemen. We also want to work towards creating a more inclusive and equitable society for all.

hero_subtitle: This party is not only for ex-servicemen but entirely for the general public. We welcome everyone who wishes to serve the nation.
about_section_p1: For the first time in Indian history, a political party has been started in Tamil Nadu by ex-servicemen under the name National Ex-Servicemen Party (NEP).
about_section_li2: Free quality education and healthcare for all
our_promise_subtitle: Focused, practical policies to strengthen communities and empower veterans.
promise_veteran_welfare_desc: Priority jobs & welfare for retired defence personnel.
promise_free_education_desc: Ensure 100% free and high-quality public education.
promise_water_&_environment_desc: Restore water bodies & protect forests and wildlife.
leadership_bio: Founder President â€” Lion. Dr. Suresh Babu. Born and raised in Ranipet district of Tamil Nadu, with patriotism flowing in his blood, he formulated his own unique policy and joined the Indian Army as a warrior. Through rigorous training and hard work, he served in various departments including DRDO.
leadership_quote: He decided to voice the rights of all sections of society beyond caste and religion. He resolved to unite farmers, general public, workers along with ex-servicemen.
why_join_page_intro: NEP is not just a political party. It is a movement founded on the values of patriotism, sacrifice, social justice, and integrity. NEP is a party with the thinking of ex-servicemen who have sacrificed their lives for the country, and a strong leadership that raises its voice for the rights of the people.
why_join_reason_1_desc: The security, unity, and sovereignty of the nationâ€”we consider it a responsibility above politics.
why_join_reason_2_desc: Without any discrimination of race, language, religion, caste, equal rights and equal opportunities for everyone is our policy.
why_join_reason_3_desc: The respect, security, and quality of life of ex-servicemen who have served the country are our priority.
why_join_reason_4_desc: Education, employment, skill developmentâ€”making youth the future leadership of the nation is our goal.
why_join_reason_5_desc: Corruption-free governance, transparency, politics that is directly accountable to the people.
why_join_reason_6_desc: NEP is not a party of leadersâ€”it's a movement that makes the voice of ordinary people the center of power.
why_join_inspirational: Serving the nation is not a dutyâ€”it is a pride.
why_join_cta_text: Join NEP today and participate in the journey of shaping the nation's future.
why_join_seo_keywords: NEP Party Member Ex-Servicemen Political Movement Patriotic Political Party Social Justice Party
why_join_hero_card_desc: A movement founded on patriotism, sacrifice, social justice, and integrity. Led by ex-servicemen with strong leadership advocating for people's rights.
our_wings_subtitle: 22 specialized wings to represent every section of society
wings_subtitle: Since the general public has equal rights and responsibilities, NEP provides dedicated wings for all professions and communities. Members can join the wing that best represents their profession, service background, or social interest.
wings_cta_subtitle: Those who wish to take responsibility in the above wings or become members are encouraged to register and contribute to nation-building.
final_cta_subtitle: Be part of a historic political movement led by those who served the nation
footer_copyright: National Ex Servicemen Party. All Rights Reserved.
footer_tech_partner_services: Web â€¢ Mobile â€¢ Cloud â€¢ AI Solutions

news_subtitle: Stay informed about the latest activities of the National Ex Servicemen Party.
news_article_1_title: NEP Demands Implementation of 'One Rank, One Pension' in Full
news_article_1_content: The National Ex Servicemen Party (NEP) today held a major protest in New Delhi, demanding the complete and immediate implementation of the 'One Rank, One Pension' (OROP) scheme as per the original recommendations. Party president, addressing the rally, stated that the current version of OROP has several anomalies that need to be rectified. He warned that if the government does not heed their demands, the protests will be intensified across the country. The party has submitted a detailed memorandum to the Defence Minister, outlining the discrepancies and suggesting corrective measures.
news_article_2_title: Party Expands its Footprint in Southern States
news_article_2_content: In a major boost to its expansion plans, the National Ex Servicemen Party has seen a surge in membership in the southern states of Tamil Nadu, Kerala, and Karnataka. The party recently opened new offices in Chennai and Bengaluru to cater to the growing number of members. A state-level committee has been formed in each of these states to coordinate the party's activities. The party leadership has expressed confidence that this expansion will help them make a significant impact in the upcoming local body elections. They attribute the growth to their consistent focus on welfare issues for ex-servicemen and their families.
news_article_3_title: Healthcare for Veterans: NEP Launches Awareness Campaign
news_article_3_content: The National Ex Servicemen Party has launched a nationwide campaign to raise awareness about the healthcare challenges faced by military veterans. The campaign, titled 'Health for Heroes', aims to highlight the inadequacies in the Ex-servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) and demand better facilities. Volunteers will visit veterans in their homes, distribute informational pamphlets, and assist them in accessing available healthcare services. The party is also running a parallel social media campaign to bring the issue to the attention of the wider public and policymakers.
news_article_4_title: Public Opinion Divided on New Economic Policies, NEP Calls for Inclusive Growth
news_article_4_content: A recent nationwide survey has revealed a sharp divide in public opinion regarding the government's new economic policies. While supporters claim the policies will boost growth and create jobs, opponents argue they will lead to increased inflation and benefit only large corporations. The NEP has called for a more inclusive approach, suggesting measures to support small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) and the agricultural sector. The party plans to release its own economic vision document next week, which it says will offer a 'pro-people, pro-growth' alternative.
founder_bio1: Born and raised in Ranipet district of Tamil Nadu, with patriotism flowing in his blood, he formulated his own unique policy and joined the Indian Army as a warrior. Through rigorous training and hard work, he served in various departments including DRDO.
founder_bio2: In 2017, he started the Ex-Servicemen Association in Kanchipuram. In 2019, he formed the state-level federation called 'Indian Ex-Tri Services and Paramilitary Forces Welfare Federation, Tamil Nadu'.
founder_quote: He decided to voice the rights of all sections of society beyond caste and religion. He resolved to unite farmers, general public, workers along with ex-servicemen.
story_p1: For the first time in Indian history, a political party has been started in Tamil Nadu by ex-servicemen under the name National Ex-Servicemen Party (NEP).
story_p2: We are pleased to inform that this party is not only for ex-servicemen but entirely for the general public.
story_p3: The first introduction of this party was held on 14/12/2023 at the Chepauk Journalists Association.
vision_desc: To create an India where every citizen enjoys equal rights, opportunities, and a dignified life. We envision a society governed by those who have already proven their dedication to the nation through their service.
mission_desc: To bring discipline, integrity, and service-oriented governance to Indian politics. We aim to unite all sections of society under one banner to fight for justice, development, and prosperity.
footer_party_bio: National Ex-Servicemen Party. A party for ex-servicemen and common people of India.
manifesto_subtitle_page: Building a Better India for All
manifesto_education_for_all_desc: Every Indian must have completed at least 12th grade education. No government benefits including driving license will be provided to those who are not educated.
manifesto_free_education_healthcare_desc: Education and healthcare are human rights, not just words. All schools and hospitals in the country will be nationalized. World-class education and healthcare will be provided 100% free and with quality.
manifesto_fast_track_justice_desc: Any case going to court will be resolved within a maximum of 3 years.
manifesto_environment_protection_desc: Strict legal action will be taken against those who violate forest, mountain, mineral resources, and wildlife protection laws.
manifesto_modern_farming_desc: All farmers will be trained with modern agricultural machinery and converted to organic farming, making them government employees.
manifesto_full_employment_desc: Due to agricultural labor shortage, 100-day work will be converted to full-time employment, making everyone government employees.
manifesto_water_conservation_desc: Lost lakes, ponds, and canals will be recovered and protected using giant machinery for de-silting.
manifesto_agniveer_priority_desc: All Agniveers who complete 4 years of service will be given priority for police department jobs, reducing state government training costs.
manifesto_veterans_employment_desc: All armed forces and paramilitary personnel will be guaranteed government or private employment based on qualification until age 60 after retirement.
manifesto_swift_criminal_justice_desc: For crimes like sexual assault and murder, investigation will be completed within 30 days and death penalty will be given to the guilty.
manifesto_quality_roads_desc: Quality roads will be built throughout the country, preventing spinal problems, neck pain, vehicle accidents, deaths, and vehicle repair issues for all taxpaying citizens.
manifesto_our_promise_desc: No more attractive advertisements - only employment based on need and all necessary assistance for those unable to work. Government jobs will be given purely on merit basis without bribery or recommendations.
gallery_album_celebration_with_people_de: Photos from community celebrations and events.
gallery_album_in_visit_of_pwd_home_desc: Visits and outreach at disability care homes.
gallery_album_makkaludan_naam_desc: Community meetings and local engagement activities.
gallery_album_naatu_nalapani_mugaam_desc: Rural welfare and local development programs.
gallery_album_other_leaders_meet_desc: Meetings with allied and visiting leaders.
gallery_album_podhu_kootam_desc: Public gatherings and town-hall style events.
gallery_album_press_meets_desc: Official press conferences and media interactions.
gallery_album_protests_desc: Documentation of peaceful protests and rallies.
gallery_album_meeting_with_naam_tamilar_: Alliance discussions with Naam Tamilar Katchi leadership.
gallery_album_other_party_contributions_: Collaborative events and contributions with allied parties.
wings_lawyers_wing_description: Supports legal awareness, justice delivery, and constitutional rights. Works towards legal reforms and free legal guidance for citizens.
wings_farmers_wing_description: Represents farmers' welfare, fair pricing, and agricultural sustainability. Focuses on rural development and food security.
wings_auto_drivers_wing_description: Advocates for auto drivers' rights, safety, and economic stability. Addresses licensing, welfare schemes, and daily operational challenges.
wings_industry_wing_description: Engages industrialists and entrepreneurs for economic growth. Promotes job creation, innovation, and responsible industrial development.
wings_social_harmony_council_description: Works to promote unity, peace, and social equality. Acts against discrimination based on caste, religion, or community.
wings_doctors_wing_description: Supports healthcare reforms and public health awareness. Encourages accessible and ethical medical services for all.
wings_ex_servicemen_wing_description: Represents veterans of the armed forces and their families. Focuses on welfare, re-employment, and dignity for retired personnel.
wings_sanitation_workers_wing_descriptio: Advocates dignity, safety, and rights of sanitation workers. Supports improved working conditions and social recognition.
wings_it_wing_description: Drives digital transformation and technology-led governance. Supports cybersecurity, innovation, and digital inclusion.
wings_workers_wing_description: Represents workers across sectors and industries. Focuses on fair wages, safety, and labor rights.
wings_motor_vehicle_drivers_wing_descrip: Supports livelihood, safety, and rights of drivers. Advocates for better infrastructure and fair regulations.
wings_women_wing_description: Empowers women in leadership, governance, and society. Works towards safety, equality, and economic independence.
wings_youth_wing_description: Engages young citizens in politics and public service. Focuses on leadership, employment, and nation-building initiatives.
wings_paramilitary_wing_description: Represents personnel from paramilitary and allied forces. Works for welfare, recognition, and post-service opportunities.
wings_retired_central_government_employe: Supports pensioners and retired central government staff. Focuses on benefits, healthcare, and policy representation.
wings_retired_state_government_employees: Represents retired state government employees. Advocates for pension rights and social security.
wings_private_security_wing_description: Represents private security professionals. Focuses on training standards, job security, and welfare.
wings_traders_wing_description: Supports small and medium traders and business owners. Promotes fair trade policies and economic stability.
wings_electrical_engineering_wing_descri: Represents electrical engineers and technical professionals. Supports infrastructure development and technical innovation.
wings_students_wing_description: Empowers students to participate in nation-building. Focuses on education quality, skills, and leadership development.
wings_teachers_wing_description: Represents educators at all levels. Promotes educational reforms and respect for the teaching profession.
wings_transgender_wing_description: Advocates equality, dignity, and inclusion for transgender persons. Supports social justice, safety, and equal opportunities.

policy_leaders_subtitle: Guided by the vision of our great national leaders
policy_leaders_vision_text: NEP party functions with the objective of implementing the policies of India's great leaders and their sacrifice, integrity, and social vision in today's politics.
